Queries.CustomerQry: SELECT customer_id, party_id from pg_crproflpt.crprofl.customer c where customer_id = '
Queries.cprQry: Select credit_profile_id from pg_crproflps.crprofladm.customer_credit_profile_rel ccpr where customer_id =  '
Queries.crdProfile: Select * from pg_crproflps.crprofladm.credit_profile cp where credit_profile_id = '<credit_profile_id>'
Queries.PartyQry: SELECT * from pg_crproflps.crprofladm.party p where party_id = '<party_id>'
Queries.IndvlQry: Select * from pg_crproflps.crprofladm.individual i where party_id = '<party_id>'
Queries.OrgQry: Select * from pg_crproflps.crprofladm.organization o where party_id = '<party_id>'
